post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Just trying to organize next development items and what needs to be done. Let's discuss about this and task assignments at the next meeting.

* Struts configurations (including ActionForm and Action class definitions)
* Database install/uninstall scripts
* Model objects
* Hibernate mapping files
* JUnit for Hibernate mapping test
* Ruby/Watir for UI driven test
* User manual

Add on if I missed anything or if you have a different idea.
post.title: Tasks
